entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is introduced as the current minister who is being replaced by his successor. He is described as being busy and having trouble with Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone Fudge has been trying to persuade, but he won't budge. He is also the recipient of Fudge's letters.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is introduced as Fudge's successor and is mentioned as possibly having more success than Fudge in persuading Dumbledore.

entities.name: muggles prime minister
entities.description: The Muggle Prime Minister is requested to meet by the portrait of the ugly little man.

relationships.description: Fudge has been trying to persuade Dumbledore, but he won't budge.
Scrimgeour is mentioned as possibly having more success than Fudge in persuading Dumbledore.
The portrait requests a meeting with the Muggle Prime Minister.
